description:
build: move the "-c" flag into HOST_CFLAGS

On Plan 9 this flag is used to discover
constant expressions in "if" statements.

messages.text:

I'd like you to review this change to

build: move the "-c" flag into HOST_CFLAGS

On Plan 9 this flag is used to discover
constant expressions in "if" statements.

CC=golang-dev
